questions.question: Hello
questions.answer: Hey there! How can I help you?

questions.question: Hi
questions.answer: Hey! How can I help you?

questions.question: what do you do
questions.answer: I am a chatbot here to answer any questions you may have about Botswana Post and it's services.

questions.question: What services are offered here?
questions.answer: Botswana Post offers mail and courier services primarily, but has other services including providing prepaid electricity & airtime, vehicle licence renewal, DSTV subscription, money transfers, and funeral plans by Hollard Life Botswana.

questions.question: who?
questions.answer: I am BPchat, a customer chat assistance for all Botswana Post customers.
